title: Child killed in childcare centre carpark in Melbourne
text:
A child has died after being struck by a vehicle in the carpark outside a Melbourne childcare centre this afternoon.

Emergency crews were called to Kiddy Palace Learning Centre on McDonalds Rd in Epping at about 4.45pm following reports a child had been hit by a car.

A Victoria Police spokesperson said the investigation into the exact cause remains ongoing and the driver of a vehicle is currently assisting police with their inquiries.

Police will prepare a report for the coroner.

McDonalds Rd was closed in both directions between Meadow Glen Drive and Civic Drive following the incident.

It has now reopened and traffic is being allowed through the area.
description: A child has died after being struck by a vehicle in the carpark outside a Melbourne childcare centre this afternoon.
